entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. Flurries over higher terrain near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers ending late this evening then cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 3 May 2023
